Uses of Class
no.steria.osgi.jsr330activator.implementation.ProviderAdapter

  • Packages that use ProviderAdapter 
    Package Description
    no.steria.osgi.jsr330activator
    This package contains an implementation of an OSGi BundleActivator that will use reflection toscan the bundle for classes implementing the Provider interface.
    no.steria.osgi.jsr330activator.implementation
    Private implementation classes for the Jsr330Activator.

      void InjectionBase.setupListener(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext bundleContext, ProviderAdapter providerAdapter) 
      void Injection.setupListener(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext bundleContext, ProviderAdapter providerAdapter)
      Will set up an OSGi listener for the injected service, so that it will be injected when the service appears in OSGi and retracted when the service disappears from OSGi.
